uz.academic-menu:
Akademik-o‚Äôquv faoliyat bo‚Äôyicha so‚Äôrovlar.

Iltimos, kerakli bo'limni tanlang: üìö
uz.academic-0:
O‚Äòzbekiston Respublikasi Vazirlar Mahkamasining 2017-yil 20-iyundagi Oliy ta‚Äôlim muassasalariga o‚Äòqishga qabul qilish, talabalar o‚Äòqishini ko‚Äòchirish, qayta tiklash va o‚Äòqishdan chetlashtirish tartibi to‚Äòg‚Äòrisidagi nizomlarni tasdiqlash haqidagi 393-son Qaroriga muvofiq xar yili Arizalar 15-iyuldan 5-avgustgacha (shu kuni ham) qabul qilinadi.

O‚Äòzbekistondagi xorijiy va nodavlat OTMlardan o‚Äòqishni ko‚Äòchirish:

1) mos va turdosh yo‚Äònalishga test yoki ijodiy imtihon topshiradi hamda o‚Äòtish balini to‚Äòplash talab etiladi. 
2) o‚Äòtish balini to‚Äòplay olmasa, super-kontrakt shartlari asosida o‚Äòqishini ko‚Äòchirishga ruxsat beriladi;
3) mos va turdosh bo‚Äòlmagan yo‚Äònalish uchun esa bir martalik ‚Äúsuper-kontrakt‚Äù to‚Äòlab, imtihonsiz ko‚Äòchirishi mumkin. 
              
Davlat OTMdan nodavlat OTMga o‚Äòqishni ko‚Äòchirish
Buni davlat nazorat qilmaydi, buning tartibini nodavlat OTMlar o‚Äòzi mustaqil belgilaydi. Nodavlat OTMga o‚Äòqishni ko‚Äòchirish mumkin yoki mumkin emasligini o‚Äòsha OTMning o‚Äòzidan aniqlashtiring. 

Bir davlat OTM ichida bir yo‚Äònalish yoki fakultetdan boshqa yo‚Äònalish yoki fakultetga o‚Äòqishni ko‚Äòchirish

Ushbu masala OTM rektori tomonidan ko‚Äòrib chiqiladi, ariza ham rektor nomiga yoziladi (transfer.edu.uz yoki my.uzbmb.uz sayti orqali emas). Bunda ko‚Äòchirilayotgan yo‚Äònalish mos va turdoshligi, ko‚Äòchirilish sababi, OTM imkoniyatlari va boshqa faktorlar inobatga olinishi mumkin.

Bir OTM va hatto bir yo‚Äònalish doirasida ta‚Äôlim shaklini yoki tilni o‚Äòzgartirish

Ushbu masala ham OTM ma‚Äômuriyati tomonidan hal qilinadi. Bunda ham ko‚Äòchirish maqsadi, OTMning imkoniyati (masalan: auditoriya sig‚Äòimi, professor-o‚Äòqituvchilari soni va hk va boshqa faktorlarga qaralishi mumkin. 

Arizalar quyidagicha qabul qilinadi:

transfer.edu.uz ‚Äî respublikaning bir davlat oliygohidan boshqa davlat oliygohiga yoki bir oliygoh ichida;

my.uzbmb.uz ‚Äî xorijiy va nodavlat oliy ta ºlim muassasalaridan davlat OTMlariga.
Kerakli hujjatlar:
‚óæÔ∏è ariza (onlayn tarzda);
‚óæÔ∏è transkript yoki reyting daftarchasi (JPEG yoki Pdf shakli);
‚óæÔ∏è akademik ma ºlumotnoma (o‚Äòqishni tiklovchilar uchun).

academic-buttons: Information on Transfer from Foreign and Non-State Universities in Uzbekistan üåç
en.academic-menu:
Academic Activity Requests.

Please select the desired section: üìö
en.academic-0:
In accordance with Resolution No. 393 of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated June 20, 2017, on the approval of regulations for admission to higher education institutions, transfer, reinstatement, and expulsion of students, applications are accepted annually from July 15 to August 5 (inclusive).

Transfer from foreign and non-state universities in Uzbekistan:

1) For transfer to a corresponding or related field, a test or creative exam is required, and the passing score must be achieved. 
2) If the passing score is not achieved, transfer is allowed under super-contract conditions;
3) For a non-corresponding or unrelated field, transfer is possible without exams upon payment of a one-time ‚Äòsuper-contract.‚Äô 
              
Transfer from a state university to a non-state university
This process is not regulated by the state; the procedure is independently determined by the non-state university. Check with the specific non-state university to confirm whether transfer is possible. 

Transfer within one state university from one field or faculty to another

This issue is reviewed by the university rector, and the application is submitted to the rector (not through transfer.edu.uz or my.uzbmb.uz). Factors such as the correspondence and relatedness of the field, the reason for transfer, the university‚Äôs capacity, and other factors may be considered.

Changing the form of education or language within one university or even one field

This issue is also resolved by the university administration. The purpose of the transfer, the university‚Äôs capacity (e.g., classroom capacity, number of professors, etc.), and other factors may be considered. 

Applications are accepted as follows:

transfer.edu.uz ‚Äî for transfers from one state university to another or within one university;

my.uzbmb.uz ‚Äî for transfers from foreign and non-state higher education institutions to state universities.
Required documents:
‚óæ️ application (online);
‚óæ️ transcript or rating book (in JPEG or PDF format);
‚óæ️ academic certificate (for those reinstating).
